taskman.backend.resource

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskman.backend.resource.Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a reservation.
    Author:
    Jeroen Van Der Donckt

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(Resource resource,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime endTime)
        Creates a new reservation with the given values.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource of the reservation
        startTime - the start time of the reservation
        endTime - the end time of the reservation
        Postcondition:
        a new reservation is created with given attributes and added to the resource and true changeable state
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the resource or timespan is null

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        public Resource getResource()
        Returns the resource of the reservation.
        Returns:
        the resource of the reservation

      • getTimeSpan

        public TimeSpan getTimeSpan()
        Returns the time span of the reservation.
        Returns:
        the time span of the reservation

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(TimeSpan timeSpan)
        Checks if this reservation overlaps with the given time span
        Parameters:
        timeSpan - the timespan to check with
        Returns:
        true if the start time of the timespan is between the start-and end time of this reservation, if the end time of the time span is between the start and end time of this reservation or if the start-and end time of this reservation are between the start and end time of the given time span

      • finishEarlier

        public void finishEarlier(java.time.LocalDateTime endTime)

      • isUserSpecific

        public boolean isUserSpecific()
        Returns the user specific state.
        Returns:
        the user specific state

      • setUserSpecific

        public void setUserSpecific()
        Sets the use specific value to true.
        Postcondition:
        the user specific value is set to true

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deconstructor for this reservation.
        Postcondition:
        the reservation is deleted from its resource its reservations and the resource is deleted from this reservation (the bidirectional link is deleted)
